actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Resolution: a strategy for freedom-an outline for human rights.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Declares it the sense of the House of Representatives that the President take steps to make trade with the Soviet Union contingent upon observance of human rights agreements, and to assure the observance of human rights with respect to prisons, hospitals, civil liberties, churches, and other guarantees of the Helsinki Accords in the Soviet Union.

titles.title: Resolution: a strategy for freedom-an outline for human rights.
